item.title: NFL Big Data Bowl 2021-2022
item.description: Introduction: When it comes to analyzing plays in todayâ€™s game, too often people form their opinions and thoughts almost entirely on how the play concluded. Is the conclusion of the play important? Of course! But often people forget the importance of analyzing the decisions and habits of players at the start of the play, because more often than not, individuals tend to display patterns. Though these patterns are beneficial for analyzing and predicting player performance, more importantly; they provide insight into the implicit interconnection of the game.
